title: The Bicycle Gang
description: Dennis Wilson (Sticks) takes you on a journey through life in the projects. What starts out as innocent kids in a Bicycle Gang eventually becomes one of the biggest drug rings on the East Coast.When Larry Weddle discovers the body of George Eastman, his childhood friend, everyone becomes a suspect. Who Killed Eastman, was it one of his friends or was it a drug deal gone bad? Police Detective Faye-Lynn Johnson is assigned to the case and her worst nightmare is realized when she discovers her boyfriend is a prime suspect for the murder. A rash of bank robberies begins just after Eastmanâ€™s death. Could they be related to his murder somehow? With the clock ticking and a media firestorm brewing, Faye-Lynn and her partner Dominick are under and extreme amount of pressure to solve these cases.
author: Ricky Corum
